Package DictionaryTypes

Class ResizingArrayDictionary

java.lang.Object
DictionaryTypes.abstractClasses.Dictionary
DictionaryTypes.abstractClasses.ArrayTypeDictionary
DictionaryTypes.ResizingArrayDictionary
All Implemented Interfaces:
DictionaryInterface
public class ResizingArrayDictionary
extends ArrayTypeDictionary
implements DictionaryInterface
This class creates the resizing array data structure and implements DictionaryInterface

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ResizingArrayDictionary()
    Constructor to initialize instance variables

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addNewWord​(java.lang.String word)
    New word added into resizing array data structure Loops through array until null value found When null value found, if word is not already contained in the array then it is added at null position If array is full, array size is doubled
    void CreateDictionary​(java.lang.String filepath)
    Creates Dictionary for resizing Array data structure A counter is first used to obtain number of non duplicate words in input file.
    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getDictionaryWords()
    Returns words in created resizing array data structure Loops through array and adds word into array list
    int getNumberOfElements()
    Returns number of words inside array structure Loops through array and increases word counter
    boolean isWord​(java.lang.String word)
    Returns boolean based on whether word is contained in array A for loop runs through array structure and if word found returns true
    void removeWord​(java.lang.String word)
    Word gets removed from resizing array data structure Loop to determine if word exists and find position of word in array New temporary array created that is used to add all words from existing array excluding the removed word The existing array is then set to the temporary array.

  • Constructor Details

    • ResizingArrayDictionary

      public ResizingArrayDictionary()
      Constructor to initialize instance variables

  • Method Details

    • CreateDictionary

      public void CreateDictionary​(java.lang.String filepath)
      Creates Dictionary for resizing Array data structure A counter is first used to obtain number of non duplicate words in input file. An array is then created which changes size according to number of input words + 5
      Specified by:
      CreateDictionary in interface DictionaryInterface
      Parameters:
      filepath - , takes in the file path of input file

    • isWord

      public boolean isWord​(java.lang.String word)
      Returns boolean based on whether word is contained in array A for loop runs through array structure and if word found returns true
      Specified by:
      isWord in interface DictionaryInterface
      Parameters:
      word - , word to be searched for

    • addNewWord

      public void addNewWord​(java.lang.String word)
      New word added into resizing array data structure Loops through array until null value found When null value found, if word is not already contained in the array then it is added at null position If array is full, array size is doubled
      Specified by:
      addNewWord in interface DictionaryInterface
      Parameters:
      word - , word to be added into array

    • removeWord

      public void removeWord​(java.lang.String word)
      Word gets removed from resizing array data structure Loop to determine if word exists and find position of word in array New temporary array created that is used to add all words from existing array excluding the removed word The existing array is then set to the temporary array. The size of the array is halved if it contains more than 5 words and the array contains less than or equal to 1/4th of the number of words in comparison to the size of the array
      Specified by:
      removeWord in interface DictionaryInterface
      Parameters:
      word - , word to be removed from array

    • getDictionaryWords

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getDictionaryWords()
      Returns words in created resizing array data structure Loops through array and adds word into array list
      Specified by:
      getDictionaryWords in interface DictionaryInterface

    • getNumberOfElements

      public int getNumberOfElements()
      Returns number of words inside array structure Loops through array and increases word counter
      Specified by:
      getNumberOfElements in interface DictionaryInterface
